author: Alex Wickham
title: Boris Johnson Has Been Admitted To Hospital For Tests After Having Coronavirus For 10 Days
description: The prime minister has gone to hospital as a precautionary measure and it was not an emergency admission, Downing Street said. View Entire Post ›
content:
